title-group.article-title: A LAGRANGE-TYPE PROJECTOR ON THE REAL LINE

abstract.p: We introduce an interpolation process based on some of the zeros of the rath generalized Freud polynomial. Convergence results and error estimates are given. In particular we show that, in some important function spaces, the interpolating polynomial behaves like the best approximation. Moreover the stability and the convergence of some quadrature rules are proved.
